segments.text: Are there any special requirements on the project ? And shall we talk around it in details ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , there're some samples in our office and you can take some to study it . Besides , you see , in recent years , we've visited a diversity of factory buildings all over the world and we hope that our building is the perfect match of advanced technology and attractiveness .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a good idea . We can improve our technology to meet your special need .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And please let white color dominate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK ! I've noted it down . And any others ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh ! I've almost forgot the location was transferred to the A county in the east of the city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , the most important thing is that our company demand the quality be exactly the same as the sample which you'll take from the office on the third floor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please feel assured that we'll abide by our promise . And we'll do everything we can to ensure delivery .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks a lot . And I believe I'll have a good time working with you .
segments.speaker: S2
